title: Anybody know this Rapha font?
content:
Hi,

Sorry to be a pain but does anybody know which fonts Rapha are using on their website? I originally thought it was a stretched version of Bell Gothic but the K is different.

Specifically interested in the larger segment of text that reads RAIN JACKET

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106070337im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rapha_3448.jpg)

Many thanks

Jamie
author: freshlydesigned

comments.content:
Closest I can figure is DIN 1451 - but the J in this ad looks different

Edit: Just realized the lower case 'g' is a two story one instead of a single. Maybe not DIN?
